name: Breachers
abstract: Breachers is a tactical 5v5 VR FPS. Plan your assault or orchestrate your defense as a team through intense close-quarters combat. Climb, vault, rappel, swing, shoot & strategize your way to victory!

detail.app_languages: English, German, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Dutch, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Spanish
detail.app_release_note:
# Competitive Hotfix v19.5.9
# Competitive
Added minimum level to play competitive (level 10)
Added distributing cash that goes over the maximum to the rest of the team (for disconnected players, this happens at 4000)
Fixed not being able to reconnect to a comp game after disconnecting due to a forced game update
Fixed keyboard remaining visible during game when changing clan tag while queuing competitive
Fixed players from the same continent getting together into a server in a different continent
Improved team balancing based on MMR
Improved ping calculation with party queueing (no longer only uses ping of the party leader)
# General
Added Vivox analytics to get a better overview of the voice chat issues
Fixed game getting softlocked after player disconnects while logging in
Fixed ragdolls spawning in weird ways
Fixed not hearing footsteps until a player died at least once
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
